# Projection { #flood_adapt.objects.Projection }

```python
objects.Projection()
```

The accepted input for a projection in FloodAdapt.

A projection is a combination of a physical projection and a socio-economic change.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

<code>[**name**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Name of the object.

<code>[**description**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Description of the object. defaults to "".

<code>[**physical_projection**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[PhysicalProjection](`flood_adapt.objects.projections.projections.PhysicalProjection`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The physical projection model. Contains information about hazard drivers.

<code>[**socio_economic_change**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[SocioEconomicChange](`flood_adapt.objects.projections.projections.SocioEconomicChange`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The socio-economic change model. Contains information about impact drivers.
